spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (True or Scaled One Forms Only)
headerEntries: Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (True or Scaled One Forms Only)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: It can use its action to polymorph into any reptilian beast or humanoid Scaled One, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: It has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: A sarrukh has an aura of fear in a 15-foot radius. This effect is otherwise identical to the fear spell (save {@dc 19}). A creature that succeeds on the save cannot be affected again by that sarrukh's fear aura for 24 hours. Creatures it deems are allies are immune to this aura. The DC is Charisma-based.

trait.name: War Caster
entries: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
entries: If it fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack (True Form Only)
entries: It makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: Trident of the Sarrukh (True Form Only)
entries: +3 Weapon. {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and it can't constrict another target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Manipulate Form
entries: See source, uses a polymorph innate ability or 5+ spell slot.

bonus.name: Trident of the Sarrukh: Domination
entries: As a bonus action, the trident can be used to cast {@spell Dominate Person} on a target within 10 ft. of the one that was stricken if the creature is a size category smaller than the wielder. The trident holds concentration in this way, but only if the attuned creature is holding the trident. An effect that dispels magic can attempt to break its concentration (save {@dc 15}). It has 3 charges, recharging by {@dice 1d3} charges at dawn.

reaction.name: Reaction: War Caster
entries: When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

legendary.name: Move
entries: It moves up to half its movement speed.

legendary.name: Cast a spell
entries: Casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action. Costs a number of actions equal to the spell level.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Make one attack with its trident, bite, or constrict.
Source: https://www.realmshelps.net/monsters/block/Sarrukh_(Progenitor_Race)

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Drow Winged Boots
entries: While you wear these boots, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can use the boots to fly for up to 4 hours, all at once or in several shorter flights, each one using a minimum of 1 minute from the duration. If you are flying when the duration expires, you descend at a rate of 30 feet per round until you land. The boots regain 2 hours of flying capability for every 12 hours they aren't in use. The power of these boots fade within 1 day when not within the presence of infernal drow magic.

trait.name: War Caster
entries: You have practiced casting spells in the midst of combat, learning techniques that grant you the following benefits:
You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.
You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands.

When a hostile creature's movement provokes an opportunity attack from you, you can use your reaction to cast a spell at the creature, rather than making an opportunity attack. The spell must have a casting time of 1 action and must target only that creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes two shortsword or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
Drow often wear magic armor and carry magic weapons that lose their enhancement bonuses permanently if they are exposed to sunlight for 1 hour or longer.

A {@creature drow elite warrior} wearing {@item +2 Studded Leather Armor||+2 studded leather} and carrying a {@item +2 shortsword} has AC 20 and a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortsword attacks.
A drow elite warrior with spellcasting ability, to control the battlefield from afar with its spells.
